text: employee communicated a positive confirmation for covid-19  employee communicated a positive confirmation for covid-19  wood is identifying those who may have worked in proximity.  appropriate notifications have been completed. this is the fourth positive result for the 21st  of december under site contact tracing program.

category: dropped object or material, lifting or moving loads, back injury, vehicle incident general
text: struck by object falling from vehicle or machinery-other than vehicle part an employee was near a truck loaded with pipes when a pipe shifted and rolled off the truck. the employee was pinned between the pipe and a stack of pipes, fracturing his pelvis.

direct exposure to electricity, unspecified two employees were shutting down equipment to move a condenser's breaker box from one building to another when an arc flash occurred, burning their left and right arms.
